system.description:
This brass circlet focuses the powers of the Mark of Detection, granting the following benefits:

The wearer activates any Least Dragonmark power effects without expending Power Points.

If he has the Lesser Mark of Detection, he can reduce the Power Point cost to activate any Lesser Dragonmark powers by 2 (to a minimum of 1).

When using the @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.sXrRk20IIFPhxkC0]{detect arcana} power of the Mark of Detection to see through conceal arcana, he automatically reduces any penalties applied by the power or the Strong Modifier by 2.

He gains a +2 bonus Notice rolls.

A character must attune the diadem by wearing it for 24 hours before its effects become active.
